nodes.text: Ne Ganna Dateel Jabba was the name of an artwork which decorated one of the walls of the Jabba the Hutt's luxury sail barge, the Khetanna.

The piece was hand-carved by slaves of a Huttese artist named Dreyba and depicted Jabba in an apparently content mood, surrounded by humanoid slave girls and drinking from a jug. Two girls appeared to be holding fans. The scene took place either inside of a tent or underneath a canopy, and cushions appeared to be spread across the ground.

The artwork was destroyed along with the whole sail barge and its passengers, after a trip to the Great Pit of Carkoon went horribly wrong. Jabba's prisoners, Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, Chewbacca, and Leia Organa managed to escape his entourage, leaving Jabba dead and the barge blasted to pieces by its own defensive laser cannon.
